BlenderHaüs (Blender) A marketing and visual communications firm specializing in brand development and positioning. BlenderHaus (Blender) delivers strategic solutions that challenge convention, create emotional connections, and achieve results. Modeled after the renowned turn of the century art movement known as Bauhaüs, BlendeHaüs is a framework for an innovative organization that houses multiple creative disciplines, promoting the free exchange of ideas among its tenants. The idea was simple: Build an environment that allows creative thinkers to flourish. The studio space at BlenderHaüs is about people and their willingness to share ideas through the power of collaboration. Multiple creative disciplines exist within the community. Architects, artists, photographers, graphic designers, web developers, illustrators and other visual communication authorities share the space. Together these unique individuals and companies make up the collective talent within the studio environment.Davis has a keen ability for shaping young creative minds and delivering creative solutions to marketing challenges for some of the world’s most recognized brands. summary: DARREN  DAVISPrincipal & Chief Creative OfficerSince 2001, Darren Davis has worked with a variation of clients from fortune 100 brands to ambitious  start-ups just starting the branding process. For more than 15 years, Darren has been helping companies bridge business objectives to successful strategic and creative outcomes.  He founded the award-winning ad agency BlenderHaüs in 2001. His work as a creative director and brand strategist has helped position nearly a hundred businesses and brands, including ABC, AOL, Coca Cola, Kraft, Dreamworks Pictures and Capitol Records.  An exceptional leader and creative thinker, Darren has been nationally recognized in respected creative forums including How, Print, Communications Arts, and Forbes Magazine.  As Chief Creative Officer of Conversiv, he draws upon his fifteen years of proven experience to put the best options and solutions on the table, and always puts customers at the forefront of ideas and challenges them to new ways of thinking.ABOUT  ConversivConversiv is a full-service marketing communication agency.
